src:
Xovosda tug‘ilgan 3 egizakka Shavkat, Miromon va Mirziyo deb ism qo‘yildi

05 Nov 2019, 17:04

Sirdaryo viloyati Xovos tumani “Qahramon” QFYda istiqomat qiluvchi Ilhomjon Oxunov va Yulduzxon Qushoqovaning farzandlari yana uch nafarga ko‘paydi, deb xabar beradi Sog‘liqni saqlash vazirligi jamoatchilik bilan aloqalar bo‘limi.


Foto: Sog‘liqni saqlash vazirligi jamoatchilik bilan aloqalar bo‘limi

Uch qiz, bir o‘g‘ildan so‘ng, tug‘ilgan uch egizak chaqaloqlarga Shavkat, Miromon, Mirziyo deb ism qo‘yildi.
“Shavkatjonning vazni 2,500, Miromonning vazni 1,500, Mirziyoning vazni 2,000 kilogramm. Chaqaloqlar muddatidan biroz oldin tug‘ilgan bo‘lishsa-da, sog‘lom. Ular viloyat perinatal markazida shifokorlar nazoratida parvarishlanmoqda. Ahamiyatli tomoni, chaqaloqlar markazimizda tug‘ilgan birinchi egizaklarimiz”, – deydi Sirdaryo viloyat perinatal markazi bo‘lim boshlig‘i Klara Babayeva.
text:
Three twins born in Havas were named after Shavkat, Miromon and Mirziyo

05 Nov 2019, 17:04

The children of Ilhomjon Akhunov and Yulduzhon Kushakova from the “Kahramon” PF in Khovos district of Syrdarya region will increase by three more, the Ministry of Health reports.


Photo: Public Affairs Department of the Ministry of Health

Three girls, one son and three twins were named after Shavkat, Miromon and Mirziyo.
“Shavkatjon weighs 2,500, Miromon weighs 1,500 and Mirziyo weighs 2,000 kg. Even though babies are born prematurely, they are healthy. They are under the supervision of doctors in the regional perinatal center. Most importantly, we are the first twins born in our baby center, ”said Klara Babayeva, head of the Syrdarya Regional Perinatal Center.
